timeline.message:
Add EnumNamingStrategy SPI

Add a new EnumNamingStrategy SPI which can be used for customizing the way enums are matched by name.
It is similar to the AccessorNamingStrategy such that it allows implementors to provide a custom way of defining a property.

timeline.bodyText: what would happen if in the "non custom" you would have a prefix CUSTOM_ would a user expect this if it's the enum related to protobuf for instance?
timeline.author: sjaakd

replies.bodyText: This is mapping String to CheeseType. CheeseType is a regular enum. The special enum is CustomCheeseType for that one you would expect the String BRIE to match the enum CustomCheeseType.CUSTOM_BRIE. Since the name based mapping constant for the CustomCheeseType is stripping the CUSTOM_ prefix
replies.author: filiphr

replies.bodyText: ah.. I get it.. Ok. nice one.. The user is in control.
replies.author: sjaakd
